title: Buttermilk American-style pancakes
ingredients: ['140g plain flour', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons of oil or melted butter', '1 (284ml) tub of buttermilk, or natural yoghurt thinned with whole milk', 'oil or butter, for frying']
